title: Winter Is Not the Death of Summer, But the Birth of Spring
overview: Pathomkan is serving 1 year and 6 months sentence for a check fraud law. In prison, he meets Bible, a young man who seems indifferent to life yet possesses a magnetic pull that draws Pathomkan in. Bible is the reason Pathomkan can smile. He is the person Pathomkan wants to wake up to every morning. He fills Pathomkanâ€˜s time in prison with countless memories. And he is the person that making it impossible for Pathomkan to forget their bond. This is the story of people's love of the unloved, but they yearn for affection and being loved in the prison filled with strangers.
